name: secav-unshortener
description: A web app that allows you to translate proofs into SeCaV Isabelle syntax

scripts.dev: rimraf dist && spago build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel build --public-url ./ index.html
scripts.prod_linux: rimraf prod dist && mkdir prod && spago bundle-app --main Main --to prod/index.prod.js && java -jar closure-compiler/closure-compiler-v20190301.jar --js prod/index.prod.js --js_output_file prod/index.js && cp index.html prod/index.html && cp style.css prod/style.css && cp help.html prod/help.html && cp licensing.html prod/licensing.html && cp auxiliary.js prod/auxiliary.js && parcel build --public-url ./ prod/index.html && rimraf prod
scripts.prod_windows: rimraf prod dist && mkdir prod && spago bundle-app --main Main --to prod/index.prod.js && java -jar closure-compiler/closure-compiler-v20190301.jar --js prod/index.prod.js --js_output_file prod/index.js && copy index.html prod\index.html && copy style.css prod\style.css && copy help.html prod\help.html && copy licensing.html prod\licensing.html && copy auxiliary.js prod\auxiliary.js && parcel build --public-url ./ prod/index.html && rimraf prod

author: Frederik Krogsdal Jacobsen <fkjacobsen@gmail.com>
